AI-ML Career Roadmap for Rishee Sharma
Goal: Achieve a ■40 LPA package within 2.5 years by mastering AI model training and app
development.
Phase 1: 0 – 6 Months (Foundation Building)

Master Python, DSA (Data Structures & Algorithms), and OOPs.

Deepen understanding of Machine Learning – Scikit-learn, Pandas, NumPy.

Learn Deep Learning – TensorFlow, PyTorch, CNNs.

Build 3–4 portfolio projects: File Organizer, Mask Detection, AI Chatbot, AI Quiz Generator.

Upload all projects on GitHub and post on LinkedIn with short demos.

Solve 1–2 DSA problems daily on LeetCode.
Phase 2: 6 – 12 Months (Deployment & Scaling)

Learn MLOps tools – Docker, FastAPI, AWS, Hugging Face, Git.

Develop one big AI-based product combining CV/NLP + app interface.

Study Data Engineering concepts: APIs, REST, and Database integration (MongoDB,
Firebase, PostgreSQL).

Start contributing to open-source AI projects or GitHub repositories.

Continue improving DSA + Problem Solving for product-based roles.
Phase 3: 1 – 2.5 Years (Industry Exposure & High-Value Skills)

Get AI/ML internships (product startups, IITs, or international remote roles).

Publish technical blogs or YouTube tutorials to build visibility.

Learn System Design and Backend Scalability concepts.

Deploy apps on Play Store / Hugging Face Spaces to demonstrate real usage.

Target top recruiters – Google, NVIDIA, Amazon, AI startups.

Build LinkedIn + GitHub brand by posting consistent updates.

Bonus: Freelance + Passive Income Streams

Freelance on platforms like Upwork, Toptal – AI automation or app projects.

Launch small AI tools or mobile apps for income & visibility.

Teach Python/AI concepts via short-form video or online courses.
Success Tips

Focus on building real projects rather than just completing courses.

Keep consistency – 2 hours daily learning + 1 hour building.

Network early on LinkedIn with AI professionals and recruiters.

Always document projects cleanly with README + demo videos.
